preconditions.precondition: Alice has chosen existing or add new device from options in Edge Agent Start.
Edge Agent 2 has been provisioned as described in the Provision New Agent diagram.

mainSequence.step: Edge Agent 2 provides instructions for adding Agent 2 and selecting authorizations.
Alice adds agent with selected authorizations.
Edge Agent 1 displays provisioning code for adding agent 2.
Alice shows the code to Edge Agent 2.
Edge Agent 2 sends add request and security keys to Edge Agent 1.
Edge Agent 1 stores security key in the wallet.
Edge Agent 1 confirms agent 2 to Alice.

Edge Agent 1 sends updated policy to Agent 2.
Edge Agent 2 stores the data in the wallet.
